==The Error class in Maashaack==

===system.errors package===

 * system.errors.ConcurrencyError : The error throws when methods that have detected concurrent modification of an object when such modification is not permissible.
 * system.errors.NoSuchElementError : Thrown by an Iterator to indicate that there are no more elements in the iteration.

===Proposals===

 * system.errors.ClassCastError   : The value not must be null.
 * system.errors.IllegalStateError : Signals that a method has been invoked at an illegal or inappropriate time.
 * system.errors.NullPointerError : Thrown when an application attempts to use 'null' in a case where an object is required.
 * system.errors.TypeMismatchError : Throwns on a type mismatch when trying to set a bean property.
